body.p:
75
Septr. 29th 3.
W. F. Evans Esq.
Glasgow, Ky.
Sir,
Your communication of 10" instant to the Governor has been referred to me.

In relation to the appointment of an Agent to collect Soldiers pay, you will ascertain and notify this Department of the time when the 21st & 9" are about to be paid, when you will receive the Agency to colelct their allotments.

Yours respy,
John Boyle
Adjt Genl Ky Vols
